nodes.text: Aridinians were a social group. Their folk music had, by 1 ABY, become famous across the galaxy for its ability to make Human ears bleed after a few notes.

Aridinians received an indirect mention in the 2010 book Rebel Force: Uprising, written by Alex Wheeler. After the release of Wheeler's book, Aridinia system was added to Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion, although no explicit link has been made between the group and the system.
